definition: to drop out of school/to leave off studying/to interrupt one's studies

sentences.english: But many girls end up dropping out to help with the family or earn money doing odd jobs.
sentences.chinese: 但是很多女孩還是輟學在家幹活，或者去打零工掙錢。

sentences.english: I was nothing but a drop-out,but look at me now.
sentences.chinese: 我以前只不過是個輟學的人，但看看我現在。

sentences.english: Once the student drops out, he or she will be disqualified from the programme.
sentences.chinese: 受助學生一旦輟學，其受助資格將會自動取消。

sentences.english: The school dropout rate also is high.
I'm a student of the world; in other words I flunked out of high school.
sentences.chinese: 我是社會學生，換句話說，我高中後就輟學了。

sentences.english: A lot of drop-outs apply for work at the local grocery store.
sentences.chinese: 許多輟學學生申請到當地的百貨店上班。

sentences.english: in the inner city, a 50 percent dropout rate is not unusual.
sentences.chinese: 在這些城鎮裏面，50%的輟學率也是稀鬆平常的事。

sentences.english: The female dropout rate has fallen in half.
sentences.chinese: 女生輟學率下降了一半。

sentences.english: A Russian born business mogul and dropout of Moscow ATI, Roman Abramovich started off making big oil deals.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯商業巨頭，莫斯科國家法律學院的輟學生。

sentences.english: Although lots of people still sign up, drop-out rates are sky-high.
sentences.chinese: 儘管還是有許多人註冊進來，但輟學率如天高。

sentences.english: The average annual earnings of high school dropouts are significantly less than the average annual earnings of high school graduates.
sentences.chinese: 高中輟學者的平均年收入要顯著低於高中畢業生。

sentences.english: He soon discovered that LeBron had all but dropped out.
sentences.chinese: 他很快發現，勒布朗了，但中途輟學。

sentences.english: A high school dropout, Bautista now speaks to young people about the dangers of gang life.
sentences.chinese: 高中輟學，現在，她要告訴年輕人幫派生活的危害。

sentences.english: I actually don't know any high school dropouts, let alone any successful ones.
sentences.chinese: 其實，我不知道任何高輟學，更遑論任何成功的。

sentences.english: In the long haul, she'll regret having been a school dropout.
sentences.chinese: 她終歸會後悔不該中途輟學。

sentences.english: Jennifer's parents have voiced disapproval of her relationship with a high school dropout.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮弗的雙親聲明不贊同她和高中輟學生的戀情。

definition: to take extra lessons in a cram school or with a private tutor
to read a book/to study/to attend school
to support a family/to raise a family
to change schools/to transfer to another college
to have nothing to do/to idle one's time away (idiom)
to expel (a member of an organization)/to fire (an employee)
to seek one's livelihood/to work to support oneself/to earn a living
to get married and have kids/to start a family
